
Website hosting documentation on the tools for interacting with the [Portable Microhaplotype Object (PMO)](https://seekdeep.brown.edu/Portable_Microhaplotype_Object/) files. 

Currently tool development is being done for python, [pmotools-python](https://github.com/PlasmoGenEpi/pmotools-python/tree/develop) but in future will include other languages like R
